name: Romaine Lettuce
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - greens category
Rich in vitamins A, K, and folate
benefits: Romaine lettuce is one of the most water-rich vegetables available with approximately 95% water content. This extremely low calorie density combined with high volume makes it particularly effective for weight loss. Being an aboveground vegetable, it ranks highest on the water scale for optimizing weight loss meals.
amount: Part of daily greens servings (Daily Dozen); use as base for salads

quotes: Similarly, when choosing vegetables, we can steer toward aboveground veggies highest on the water scale.
1 head romaine lettuce, chopped into bite-size pieces
